title: 81/803/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 September 1981 authorizing the Italian Republic to maintain in force the requirement of a deposit when purchases of foreign currency are made (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 23 September 1981 authorizing the Italian Republic to maintain in force the requirement of a deposit when purchases of foreign currency are made (Only the Italian text is authentic) (81/803/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Commission shall supervise the application of this Decision and reserves the right to modify the conditions relating thereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
